itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, September 6, 2013
description: JPMorgan is ending its student loan business. A look at what it's like getting a job after being out of work for so long. And what city can afford to put on the 2020 Olympics?
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, September 6, 2013
byline: Rowan Moore Gerety, Mitchell Hartman, Adrienne Hill, David Brancaccio, Nishat Kurwa, Bruce Johnson and Queena Kim
teaser: JPMorgan is ending its student loan business. A look at what it's like getting a job after being out of work for so long. And what city can afford to put on the 2020 Olympics?
